ProductInfo.Features:
Full D1 Real-Time Record (120 FPS)
Multi-Tasking Functionality
USB Mouse for Easy Navigation
Remote Internet Monitoringvia Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Safari for Mac
Mobile Phone Surveillanceon iPhone, iPad, Android via Q-See QT View Mobile App WinPhone and BlackBerry 5, 6, 7 via SuperCam
MAC OS Compatible (10.6 & 10.7)
4 BNC Inputs/ 1 VGA Output / 1 HDMI
Backup via PC, Flash Drive or USB HDD
Email alerts with snapshot images when motion is detected, the hard drive is full, or video loss has occurred.
Various Recording Modes:
Motion Detection, Schedule, Alarm, 24/7
2 RCA Audio Inputs / 1 Audio Output
Remote Control and USB Mouse Included
Pre-installed 500GB HDD
Supports 1 SATA HDD up to 2TB HDD
1-RS-485 Connection
*****Camera Features: *****
Connect up to 4 Cameras!
4 Color Hi-Res 600TVL Cameras
600 TV Lines Resolution
1/3" Enhanced Infrared Cut Sensors
36 IR Leds for 100 ft. of Night Vision
